findings.title: Increase in the amount of tokens during exchange due to arithmetic overflow of a variable
findings.description: Arithmetic overflow occurs when converting an int256 to uint256 without checking if the number is less than 0, resulting in a large value.

findings.title: Decrease in the amount of tokens during exchange due to arithmetic overflow of a variable
findings.description: Arithmetic overflow occurs when converting uint256 to int256, leading to a decrease in the modulus of the initial value of the variable.
